 <channel>
   <title>Zorba: Ticket #114 (load xml crashes when reading attributes)</title>
  <link>https://fifthelement.inf.ethz.ch/trac/zorba/ticket/114</link>
  <description>&lt;p&gt;
I try to load a xml but it crashes when loading attributes. After all my debug I see that in function startElement() there is a attrNodes filled with the attributes, but it is erased when moving the attributes into the element object. Then the attrNodes is used again, and it crashes there. I don't know how to change the code in a proper way.
&lt;/p&gt;
</description>
